Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Humid forest remnant just outside reserve. Song of male, followed by song of female at higher pitch, followed by calls by both birds. These are Calls A and C in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil'.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Poecilotriccus fumifrons,Capsiempis flaveola,Pitangus sulphuratus,Pheugopedius genibarbis,Sporophila leucoptera
